tool_description: Our KFC Locations API is a comprehensive and accurate data source of all KFC restaurant locations in the United States. This API allows users to retrieve detailed information about each location, including address, phone number, hours of operation, and more. This data can be easily integrated into a wide range of use cases, such as delivery services, marketing, retail analysis, navigation, and research and development.
title: KFC locations

api_list.name: GET all City names
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kfc-locations.p.rapidapi.com/kfc/all-city"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kfc-locations.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET all KFC locations by state
api_list.description: Get all KFC locations by state
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kfc-locations.p.rapidapi.com/kfc/location/state/{state}/{page}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kfc-locations.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET all KFC locations by state and city
api_list.description: GET all KFC locations by state and city
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kfc-locations.p.rapidapi.com/kfc/location/state/{state}/city/{city}/{page}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kfc-locations.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
